thread.title: Nice place and great location
thread.title_full: Nice place and great location - Review of Peking International Youth Hostel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: LJ B
title: Nice place and great location
text: We checked in late at night but the staff is still accommodating. Though not many of them can really speak english very well. The restaurant is very beautiful and the food is just about right. Though the room's okay, don't expect luxurious room. It's just a simple two beds and an ordinary restroom.
